items.content:
<script type="text/javascript" src="//media.flixfacts.com/js/loader.js"
      data-flix-distributor="12699"
      data-flix-language="gu"
      data-flix-brand="<%= marca %>"
      data-flix-mpn=""
      data-flix-ean="<%= gr_ean %>"
      data-flix-sku="<%= product_sku %>"
      data-flix-button="flix-minisite"
      data-flix-inpage="flix-inpage"
      data-flix-button-image=""
      data-flix-fallback-language="t2"
      data-flix-price="">
</script>
<script id="accvent-loader" type="text/javascript" src="https://accvent.com/scripting/frameloader.js" data-search="<%= modelo %>" data-brand="<%= data_brand %>" data-lang="es"></script>

<script type='text/javascript'> var ccs_cc_args = ccs_cc_args || []; ccs_cc_args.push(['cpn', '<%= product_sku %>']); ccs_cc_args.push(['mf', '<%= marca %>']); ccs_cc_args.push(['pn', '<%= modelo %>']); ccs_cc_args.push(['upcean', '<%= gr_ean %>']); ccs_cc_args.push(['ccid', 'CATALOG_CODE']); ccs_cc_args.push(['lang', 'ES']); ccs_cc_args.push(['market', 'GT']); (function () { var o = ccs_cc_args; o.push(['_SKey', '9dc1ebca']); o.push(['_ZoneId', 'hp-auto-pp']); var sc = document.createElement('script'); sc.type = 'text/javascript'; sc.async = true; sc.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'cdn.cs.1worldsync.com/jsc/h1ws.js'; var n = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; n.parentNode.insertBefore(sc, n);})();</script>
